Type.Name: HTMLCommandType

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HTMLCommandType extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Enumeration of commands that knows how to respond to.
